ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The authors acknowledge the efforts of the Laboratory Technologists of the NASENIC Research Centre, Akure, Nigeria and the Laboratory Technologists of Chemistry Department of the University of Ilorin, Kwara State, Nigeria in carrying out the gas chromatographic analysis and the EDXRF Spectrophotometer analysis during this research work. The authors are grateful to Daniel for his contributions during the research work.
